title: Bug 14943Code Assist does not respect platform line ends
description: Bug 14943Code Assist does not respect platform line ends
OB: The Code Assist feature does not respect the platform line ends when suggesting code completions or providing code templates.
EB: The Code Assist feature should respect the platform line ends when suggesting code completions or providing code templates.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new class.
2. Add a method to the class.
3. Define a local variable for an array.
4. Observe the suggestions or code templates provided by the Code Assist feature and note that they do not respect the platform line ends.
